name: NVB
description: NovaBank is a decentralized finance (DeFi) protocol based on a proven and successful perpetual economic model (such as OlympusDAO). With a solid technical architecture, innovative yield models, and a diversified Web3 ecosystem, NovaBank empowers users with the right to issue tokens through a unique token issuance logicðŸ’¡.
